                     </div>\n              <div class=\"wrap-content\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t  <div class=\"logos-heading\">Trusted by thousands of nonprofits &amp; social good projects around the rotating-features\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"wrap\">\n              <h2>The tools you need to raise more in today’s connected world.</h2>\n              <p class=\"subtitle\">Inspire your community, activate your supporters, reach new donors, and raise more online. CauseVox makes online fundraising tools that empower you to easily build, launch, and manage your online fundraising campaigns.</p>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"tabs\">\n                                  <a data-tab=\"tab_0\" href=\"#\" class=\"active\">Desktop &amp; grow.</h3>\n\n<p>Unlike expensive, cumbersome fundraising tools, CauseVox is easy-to-use for you and your donors, while also having flexible pricing and no contracts.</p>                    </div>\n receipts, export donation and fundraiser data, add offline donations, edit fundraising pages, invite multiple admins to your account, and much more.</p>                    </div>\n                  \n                  </div>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</li><li class=\"slick-slide slick-cloned\" data-slick-index=\"5\" aria-hidden=\"true\" tabindex=\"-1\" style=\"width: 687px;\">\n                                    <div class=\"rotating-feature\">\n                                      <div class=\"media\">\n                                              <img width=\"740\" height=\"538\"                </div>\n                    <div class=\"description\">\n                      <h3>Fundraise anywhere, on any device.</h3>\n\n<p>Make it easy for your supporters to experience, share, and donate to your campaign intuitively on any device (mobile phones, tablets, and desktops).</p>                    </div>\n                    \n                  </div>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</li></div></div>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<button type=\"button\" data-role=\"none\" class=\"slick-next slick-arrow\" aria-label=\"Next\" role=\"button\" style=\"display: block;\">Next</button></ul>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t\t</section>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<section class=\"flexible-content full-width-content bg-light-gray bg-branded\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"wrap\">\n              <div class=\"wrap-heading\">\n                <h2>Craft beautiful, branded campaigns without tech people.</h2>                              </div>\n              <div class=\"wrap-content\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t  <p style=\"padding: 0 15%; text-align: center;\">Build your campaigns to tell your story with our easy-to-use design tools. Tailor your campaigns with the customizations you need to raise more and reach new donors.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-9299\" src=\"https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/fundraising-design-branding.png\" alt=\"Branded Fundraising Campaigns\" width=\"1280\" height=\"384\" srcset=\"https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/fundraising-design-branding.png 1280w, https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/fundraising-design-branding-300x90.png 300w, https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/fundraising-design-branding-768x230.png 768w, https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/fundraising-design-branding-1024x307.png 1024w, https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/fundraising-design-branding-700x210.png 700w, https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/fundraising-design-branding-610x183.png 610w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1280px) 100vw, 1280px\"></p>\n<span class=\"et_bloom_bottom_trigger\"></span>              </div>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t\t</section>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<section class=\"flexible-content use-cases\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"wrap\">\n              <h2>Thousands have used CauseVox to fundraise better online.</h2>\n              <p class=\"subtitle\">We asked a few of our customers “What’s changed for the better since you started using CauseVox?” Here’s what they said …</p>\n              <div class=\"tabs\">\n                                  <a data-tab=\"tab_0\" href=\"#\" class=\"active\">Peer-to-Peer Fundraising</a>\n                                  <a data-tab=\"tab_1\" href=\"#\">Nonprofit Crowdfunding</a>\n                                  <a data-tab=\"tab_2\" href=\"#\">Disaster &amp; manage recurring gifts within your campaigns.</p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"one-third\">\n<h3>Donation Tiers</h3>\n<p>Setup tiers of giving related to impact to encourage donors to give more.</p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"one-third first\">\n<h3>Multiple Campaigns</h3>\n<p>Create custom campaigns for each of your fundraising appeals.</p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"one-third\">\n<h3>Team Fundraising</h3>\n<p>Equip groups to fundraise through a team-based page.</p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"one-third\">\n<h3>Blog &amp; Impact Updates</h3>\n<p>Fuel your campaign with stories and timely impact updates.</p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"one-third first\">\n<h3>Social Media</h3>\n<p>Integrate your social media accounts to make sharing easy.</p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"one-third\">\n<h3>Donation Receipts</h3>\n<p>Automatically send customizable receipts to your donors.</p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"one-third\">\n<h3>International Support</h3>\n<p>Launch a campaign even if you’re not based in the United States.</p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"one-third first\">\n<h3>Donation Tipping</h3>\n<p>Offer your donors the option to cover transaction fees.</p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"one-third\">\n<h3>Custom Fields</h3>\n<p>Capture custom information from donors &amp; fundraisers.</p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"one-third\">\n<h3>Integrations (coming early 2017)</h3>\n<p>Integrate CauseVox with your other fundraising tools (Salesforce, Constant Contact, etc.)</p>\n</div>\n<span class=\"et_bloom_bottom_trigger\"></span>              </div>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t\t</section>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<section class=\"flexible-content content-with-image bg-staff\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"wrap\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"grid equal-heights\">\n                                  <div class=\"one-half\">\n                    <div class=\"content\">\n                      <h2>Powerful online fundraising you and your donors will love.</h2>                      <p>You don’t just get a tool. We integrate powerful technology, industry-leading best practices, and experienced support to guide you to success.</p>\n\n<p>Get started for free and upgrade as you grow.</p>                      <a class=\"button -light\" href=\"https://resources.causevox.com/request-demo/\">Request A Personalized Demo</a>                    </div>\n                  </div>\n                  <div class=\"one-half first\">\n                    <div class=\"image pull-right\">\n                      <img width=\"740\" height=\"900\" src=\"https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/rob-768x934.png\" class=\"attachment-medium_large size-medium_large wp-image-9271\" alt=\"Rob Wu CEO of CauseVox\" srcset=\"https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/rob.png 768w, https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/rob-247x300.png 247w, https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/rob-700x851.png 700w, https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/rob-610x742.png 610w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 740px) 100vw, 740px\">                    </div>\n                  </div>\n                \t\t\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t\t</section>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<section class=\"flexible-content full-width-content bg-light-gray\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"wrap\">\n              <div class=\"wrap-heading\">\n                <h2>Frequently Asked Questions</h2>                              </div>\n              <div class=\"wrap-content\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t  <div class=\"one-half first\">\n<h3>How does CauseVox help me?</h3>\n<p>Fundraisers are superheroes. You’re fighting everyday to make our world better. We built CauseVox to be your superhero tool belt.</p>\n<p>CauseVox gives you the tools you need to run successful online fundraising campaigns in today’s connected world without asking a designer or techie for help.</p>\n<p>You’re able to easily build dedicated fundraising pages to tell your story with our easy-to-use design tools and tailor your campaigns with the customizations you need. Tap into the power of peer-to-peer fundraising and empower your supporters to raise funds through personal &amp; team pages for your cause. Offload back-office tasks like reporting, managing donations, and receipting, so you can focus on spending more time with your donors.</p>\n<p>You don’t just get a tool. We integrate powerful technology, industry-leading best practices based on 50k+ campaigns, and expert support to guide you to exceed your goals.</p>\n<h3>How do I accept donations with CauseVox?</h3>\n<p>CauseVox integrates with <a href=\"http://support.causevox.com/for-people-interested-in-causevox/how-do-i-process-donations-with-causevox\" target=\"_blank\">Stripe or PayPal</a> to process donations and accepts credit card payments directly to your specified account. CauseVox and transaction fees are automatically deducted out of each donation as it’s processed, so you don’t need to worry about covering those fees directly.</p>\n<h3>How do I sign up?</h3>\n<p>You start with a free trial <a href=\"https://admin.causevox.com\" target=\"_blank\">here</a>. We don’t ask for any payment until you’ve seen how CauseVox can help you reach your fundraising goals.</p>\n<h3>How does the free trial work?</h3>\n<p>If you choose the <a href=\"https://www.causevox.com/pricing\" target=\"_blank\">Lite and Standard plan</a>, you’ll receive a free trial that waives the monthly fee ($55 or $155, depending on your plan) until you raise your first $3,000 online with CauseVox. CauseVox and credit card transaction fees are still deducted automatically from each donation.</p>\n<h3>Is there a setup fee?</h3>\n<p>Nope. You’re able to get started for free and upgrade as you grow.</p>\n<h3>Does the CauseVox fee include credit card transaction fees?</h3>\n<p>No. CauseVox’s fee and credit card transaction fees are automatically deducted from donations separately. We charge a fee of 5% on donations in the Free plan, 4.5% on donations in the Lite plan, and 4.25% on donations in the Standard plan. Visit Stripe and PayPal for their specific credit card donation processing rates for your country.</p>\n<h3>How long are your contracts?</h3>\n<p>CauseVox plans are paid monthly or yearly. We make it simple to get started and you’re able to suspend or cancel your service at any time.</p>\n<h3>Can I get a discount?</h3>\n<p>Yes, we offer discounts on up-front long-term commitments. You’ll receive a 10% discount with your annual purchase.</p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"one-half\">\n<h3>What type of fundraising can&nbsp;I do with CauseVox?</h3>\n<p>Online fundraising simply runs better with CauseVox. You get everything you need to rally your supporters, reach new donors, and raise more online in today’s connected world. You can use CauseVox to create fundraising campaigns year-round.</p>\n<p>Our customers use CauseVox for peer-to-peer fundraising, nonprofit crowdfunding campaigns, capital campaigns, fundraising events, run, walk, bike-athons, disaster &amp; relief appeals, DIY fundraising, annual funds, giving days and year-end fundraising.</p>\n<h3>Who uses CauseVox?</h3>\n<p>Fundraisers from around the world at animal protection, community service, environmental, arts, global development, private schools, universities, religious centers, and more nonprofits have raised millions with CauseVox.</p>\n<h3>I’m a small nonprofit, is CauseVox for me?</h3>\n<p>Yes. We’re dedicated to serving small fundraising teams. We allow you to get started for free and upgrade as you grow.</p>\n<h3>I’m not in the US, can I use CauseVox?</h3>\n<p>Absolutely! Fundraisers from around the world can use CauseVox to raise money for their cause. We only ask that, especially if you’re outside of North America, you check with Stripe or PayPal to ensure you’re able to obtain an account to process donations.</p>\n<h3>I’m not a nonprofit, can I use CauseVox?</h3>\n<p>Definitely! Anyone can use CauseVox. You’re not required to be a nonprofit, 501(c)3, or official charity.</p>\n<h3>How do I cancel service?</h3>\n<p>Cancelling your CauseVox service is an easy and no-questions-asked process. You’re able to do this right from your billing page in your account settings.</p>\n<h3>Can I switch plans?</h3>\n<p>Yes, at any time, under the billings tab in your account settings. When you upgrade or downgrade your services, you will receive either a pro-rated charge or refund, depending on the cost of your new plan.</p>\n<h3>What currencies and countries does CauseVox support?</h3>\n<p>With CauseVox, you can choose to raise money in USD, AUD, CAD, CHF, DKK, EUR, GBP, HKD, MXN, NOK, NZD, SEK, SGD, and many others. Visit Stripe and PayPal to see which currencies are supported in your country.</p>\n<h3>Have other questions?</h3>\n<p>See more FAQs or reach out to our team <a href=\"https://intercom.help/causevox/for-people-interested-in-causevox\" target=\"_blank\">here</a>.\n</p></div>\n<span class=\"et_bloom_bottom_trigger\"></span>              </div>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t\t</section>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<section class=\"flexible-content content-with-image bg-gradient-blue\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"wrap\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"grid equal-heights\">\n                                  <div class=\"one-half\">\n                    <div class=\"content\">\n                      <h2>We're better together.</h2>                      <p>CauseVox is designed specifically to help you run successful online fundraising campaigns in today's connected world. You're able to inspire, activate, and rally supporters around your cause.</p>                      <a class=\"button -light\" href=\"https://admin.causevox.com\">Start Free Trial</a>                    </div>\n                  </div>\n                  <div class=\"one-half first\">\n                    <div class=\"image \">\n                      <img width=\"740\" height=\"538\" src=\"https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/fundraising-campaign-desktop-mobile-768x558.png\" class=\"attachment-medium_large size-medium_large wp-image-9297\" alt=\"Desktop &amp; Mobile Friendly\" srcset=\"https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/fundraising-campaign-desktop-mobile-768x558.png 768w, https://26e82812lcn1phu7x39a4myi-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/fundraising-campaign-desktop-mobile-1024x744.png 1024w,
